definition: the act of deriding or treating with contempt, subject to laughter or ridicule
details:
noun
- the act of deriding or treating with contempt
= synonyms: derision
- language or behavior intended to mock or humiliate
verb
- subject to laughter or ridicule
= example: subject to laughter or ridicule
= synonyms: roast, guy, rib, blackguard, laugh at, jest at, make fun, poke fun
